## Get the data

1.  Go to <https://data.world/wetchler/okcupid-profiles-sf-20120630>
2.  Find the "download" button
3.  Rename the csv to `okcupid.csv`
4.  Upload it to the `data/` folder here ('import' button in Files pane)
